metadata.title: CVE-2023-22051

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 SP5

SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP5

metadata.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle GraalVM Enterprise Edition, Oracle GraalVM for JDK product of Oracle Java SE (component: GraalVM Compiler).  Supported versions that are affected are Oracle GraalVM Enterprise Edition: 21.3.6, 22.3.2; Oracle GraalVM for JDK: 17.0.7 and  20.0.1. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Oracle GraalVM Enterprise Edition, Oracle GraalVM for JDK.  Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in  unauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle GraalVM Enterprise Edition, Oracle GraalVM for JDK accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 3.7 (Confidentiality impacts).  CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).
